name: Escape Island (TheSmetter)
description:
Escape Island is a prototype. The idea is that you spawn in a randomly generated 2D world with lots of diffrent resources. You then have to gather the right resources and craft new items to escape the island before it's to late. There should be a limited time to do so, since every night there will be monsters outside trying to kill you.

What is ready:

  • 2D world generation
  • item and inventory system
  • A* Pathfinding

The game will include

  •  exploring randomly generated caves
  •  combat
  •  exploring a variety of diffrent resouces and items
  •  crafting
  • plant crops
  • placing machines and other stuff onto the 2d grid
